tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.3.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Close Quarters
programme.desc: Back at JAG, Harm is flooded with cases but still wants to help out an 80-year-old veteran accused of robbery. Meanwhile, Turner takes on an assignment in a sub whose crew has rescued possible defecting North Koreans.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Posse Comitatus
programme.desc: Harm and Mac argue the case of a Marine pilot who used force to interfere with a local police matter that led to a man’s killing. Roberts is the investigating officer in the matter of a Navy doctor who is requesting conscientious objector status.(n)

programme.title: JAG: The Boast
programme.desc: When an unwitting corporal boasts to a reporter that he killed an Iraqi prisoner of war, facts begin to emerge that could convict him despite his later claim that he was only lying toi mpress.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Pulse Rate
programme.desc: Harm and Mac go aboard the USS Gillcrist to determine if a seaman’s fatal accident during a routine repair was the result of a co-worker’s dereliction of duty or worse.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Good Intentions
programme.desc: Mac defends a petty officer and former alcoholic accused of a brutal murder after a drinking binge which renders him useless in remembering details that could help him. Roberts is entangled in the case of a Navy Commander accused of embezzling funds.(n)

programme.title: JAG: People vs SECNAV
programme.desc: After an incident in Iraq claims the lives of innocent civilians, SecNav is brought up on charges of war crimes in International Court, and Harm and Mac must defend him. Meanwhile, during a trip to the arcade, little A.J. goes missing.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Crossroads
programme.desc: To protect a key witness who is en route to testifying against a deadly drug cartel, Team Scorpion takes her on the run, with the cartel hot on their heels.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Cliffhanger
programme.desc: Walter finally learns Cabe's long-kept secret regarding the Baghdad mission, and it threatens to tear Team Scorpion apart forever.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Postcards From the Edge
programme.desc: Scorpion, torn apart and uncertain about their future as a team, must come together for their most important mission yet to save Walter's life as his car teeters on the side of a cliff.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Satellite Of Love
programme.desc: The new Director of Homeland Security reunites the team when a nuclear powered Russian satellite is knocked out of orbit and must be diverted before it detonates over Southern California.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Cuba Libre
programme.desc: Team Scorpion heads to Cuba when a woman from Cabe's past pleads for him to help catch a Serbian war criminal.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Wanting
programme.desc: When a tenement-building shooting leads to the discovery of an executed gang leader, 15 Division must race to find the killer before a gang war breaks out.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Going Under
programme.desc: When 15 Division goes undercover at a club-land bar that’s a possible hub for illegal handguns, Chris’s erratic behavior and concern for a specific drug dealer make Dov suspicious.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Two Truths and a Lie
programme.desc: As the officers of 15 Division try to hunt down the killer of Brian Gowdy – Andy and Sam go on the road to interview a list of inmates at Millburn Penitentiary.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Deal with the Devil
programme.desc: In the midst of a chaotic day at the station, Oliver prepares Andy to defend herself at Duncan’s dismissal hearing, now happening two hours from now.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Exit Strategy
programme.desc: Chris’s addiction issues come to a head when an innocuous call to a middle-class home puts Dov and Chris in the middle of a suspicious home invasion investigation.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: "Moving Day"
programme.desc: 15 Division is assigned to a community outreach program, “Moving Day”, to help tenants move out of a subsidized-housing complex that’s being torn down.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Yvette takes her team to the mysterious Guys Cliffe House, once a private dwelling, it is now home to the Fraternal Brotherhood of Freemasons. The team are followed by a very persistent poltergeist that will seem to stop at nothing to get their attention.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Yvette and her team continue their investigation into this mysterious place. With something seemingly stalking the crew the night ends with a particularly vigorous spirit in a very small room.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: From the start activity prevalent in this historical building. Glen is faced with something unexplained early on, Gregg is faced with his most demanding vigil yet and the rest of team chase a sinister shadow that lurks in the dark corridor.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Yvette and her team continue their investigation, moving from the cellar to the upper floors. While Yvette and Glen explore the auditorium, something follows Karl upstairs, and the rest of the team captures some of their best evidence yet.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: An all but deserted manor house that boasts murder, death and intrigue among its history becomes the setting for one of the most intriguing investigation to date. The team are showered with object that appear to land in the same way.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 5
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Prescription For Fear
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Bartonville, Illinois to investigate the Peoria Asylum.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Glimmer Men
programme.desc: TAPS heads to Quincy, Massachusetts to investigate the unexplainable paranormal events that are haunting a 716 foot long ship.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: The crew discovers that a rogue planet, Marduk, has been creating weapons of mass destruction.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Leper's Kiss
programme.desc: A hitman by the name of the Leper is targeting the leaders of the New Commonwealth.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: For Whom the Bell Tolls
programme.desc: The Andromeda is haunted by a mysterious creature that comes aboard during a solar storm.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: And Your Heart Will Fly Away
programme.sub-title: And Your Heart Will Fly Away
programme.desc: When a long lost love returns, Tyr disappears from the ship to protect her from an assassin.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Unconquerable Man
programme.desc: Set in an alternate universe where Dylan died and Gaheris Rhade is trying to reform the Commonwealth.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.66
programme.desc: A woman and her niece wage war over impound fees on a Chevy Trailblazer, the cost of college tuition, and $92 dollars allegedly ‘stolen’ by a raccoon.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.160
programme.desc:
A karaoke business owner is suing his former employee for			
allegedly stealing a client and damaging his equipment.			
A $5,000 loan made from a cash advance on a credit card destroys			
a friendship.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.48
programme.desc: Man accused of punching lover, sued for allegedly stealing bill money due to gambling habit/Woman uses inheritance to aid brother, demands repayment; he alleges false arrest and refuses payment.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.14
programme.desc: Teenagers, romantically linked to the same man, bicker over backstabbing, an assault at a party, and car vandalism.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.53
programme.desc: A case of stolen identity and destroyed credit between sisters is\t\t\t\r\ndisputed/A potted plant falls off a balcony and hits a man in the head; he\t\t\t\r\nsues his neighbor for the cost of his medical bills.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.168
programme.desc: Woman allegedly destroys sister's TV after affair with ex-boyfriend revealed. Woman sues ex-boyfriend for instigating violence at house party brawl.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.5
programme.desc: Judge probes man giving ex's furniture to friend; ex had short move-out time/Woman blames ex's area for car theft, accuses him of negligence.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.206
programme.desc: Furniture left out in the snow, an alleged campaign to ruin an ex-\t\t\t\r\nlover’s reputation, and an alleged assault in a car come into play\t\t\t\r\nwhen ex-lovers who met online call it quits.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.22
programme.desc: Intoxicated partygoer alleges knocked-out cold, seizures, 68 stitches from bottle hit, sues woman/Ex-roommates dispute rent, apartment damages, stolen property.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.12
programme.desc: Woman sues ex for car payments, damages, unpaid tickets, and property return; he countersues for car value/Co-workers' horseplay leads to ruptured eye socket; they dispute damage responsibility.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.44
programme.desc: Photographs held hostage as collateral, a poorly-financed Easter party, and chronic unemployment come into play when ex- roommates fight over money/Ex-lovers dispute responsibility for a kicked-in door and the alleged theft of furniture.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Twelve aspirants try to impress Gordon Ramsay, as they compete for the post of head chef at a Las Vegas restaurant.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: After a disastrous opening night, both teams prepare for the next challenge; a contestant starts to succumb to the pressure; a challenge tests food-preparation skills; another chef must leave.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams prepare breakfast for men and women of the US Armed Forces dining in the kitchen, one contestant falls seriously ill and another chef has to leave.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: When the losing team is unable to identify some commonplace items in a taste-test challenge, chef Gordon Ramsay orders a grotesque taste-testing practise that turns several stomachs.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The remaining seven chefs must present a meal for a wedding reception at the restaurant. The teams race to make sure they do not disappoint the newlyweds or the hungry bridal party.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Canlan Ice Sports Corp is the largest private owner of sports facilities in North America. CEO Joey St Aubin admits their prices are higher than local municipal rinks, but believes his company offers a premium service and better ice quality.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Tigner, the president of Kendall-Jackson Wine Estates, the second largest family owned wine company in the world, goes undercover posing as a grocery store employee who is pursuing his dream job in the wine industry.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO Ellis Jacob goes undercover doling out snacks and tickets while assessing how to enhance the moviegoer experience within Canada’s largest motion picture exhibitor across the board.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: The CEO of Canadian restaurant chain East Side Mario’s finds out what it’s really like for the Average Joe when he steps away from financial management to spend a week working undercover in his own kitchens.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Bernt Bodal is the CEO of American Seafoods, one of the largest seafood companies in the United States. He is going undercover to look for ways for the company to grow.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Challenge
programme.desc: When Jeff, Russell, and Adam make a bet to see who would be able to score the soonest, the three put their thinking caps on and rise up to the challenge.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Flirting
programme.desc: On the advice of Russell, Jack's flirtation with a colleague at work reveals that she's more than happy to have an affair. Russell, realizing he left his phone at the home of a one-night stand, sends Timmy to find it.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Four Pillars
programme.desc: To make Audrey happy, Jeff begrudgingly agrees to see a couple's therapist. Meanwhile, Russell develops a crush on Timmy's fiancé.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Ghost Story
programme.desc: Audrey is upset when Jeff reveals to her that he does not believe she saw her dead grandmother's ghost. Meanwhile, Russell tries to persuade Timmy not to go through with his arranged marriage.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Indian Giver
programme.desc: Audrey is surprised by Jeff's sudden interest in her favorite reality show until she discovers the reason. Meanwhile, to Russell's delight, Timmy has second thoughts about his impending arranged marriage.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: 3rd Wheel
programme.desc: Unbeknownst to Jeff, Audrey lies to her homely friend Liz that she is on Jeff's list of women he would sleep with if Audrey were not around.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Snoozin' For A Bruisin'
programme.desc: When Jeff and Audrey switch sides of the bed, Jeff accidentally rolls over and clocks Audrey in the face, landing her in the hospital.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Reunion
programme.desc: Audrey attends her high school reunion intent on proving to her former classmates how great her life is in New York City. Meanwhile, Russell accidentally ruins Timmy's dinner party.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Free Free Time
programme.desc: When Audrey's weekly girls' night out is canceled, Jeff seeks out time alone; however, his plans are foiled every step of the way. Meanwhile, Russell discovers that Timmy has a lot of pent-up aggression toward him.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Score
programme.desc: Jeff spends the evening trying to avoid learning the score of a Rangers game after Audrey forces him to give up his tickets and go to her boss' party instead. Meanwhile, at the game, Russell is mortified when Timmy roots against the home team.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Atlantic City
programme.desc: Audrey tries to make Jeff feel guilty for not telling her that his friend's bachelor party in Atlantic City was canceled; however, her plan backfires when Jeff discovers that Audrey is also being deceitful.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Moms & Dads
programme.desc: Dog pursues two people whose lives have been ruined by drugs. First, he tracks Mae, who traded a good home and loving family for an ice pipe. The next case involves Jude. His addiction has caused his pregnant wife to fear for her safety.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Do Unto Others
programme.desc: Dog is a rough, tough bounty hunter, but he's a softie at heart, as the two cases in this episode show.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: A Helping Hand
programme.desc: Dog answers two very different calls for help from women. In the first case, he helps Leland protect Maria, who's being threatened by her violent husband. Then Dog visit a young woman who's dying and has asked to see Dog as one of her final wishes.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Take Your Daughter to Work Day
programme.sub-title: Take Your Daughter to Work Day
programme.desc: Baby Lyssa, who's just turned 18 and is studying to become a bondsman, gets to do some on-the-job training when she helps Dog hunt for Wayne, who's run out on a bond for second-degree assault.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: In Sickness and In Health
programme.desc: Dog is sick as a dog, but he still must lead the hunt for a fugitive named James. James' girlfriend tries to cover for him, but Dog surprises James in his bedroom and leads him away in cuffs.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: If the Shirt Fits...
programme.desc: Beth buys Dog a shirt with an embroidered chicken, but Dog explains he only wears shirts with pictures of either Jesus or a Harley-Davidson. When it's time to go to work, the team goes after Necia, a fugitive with felony charges pending.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Thief Who Stole Christmas
programme.desc: It's Christmas day, and Dog sets out to nab Raymond, who robs to support his ice habit, and give him a little Christmas gift - shiny new handcuffs.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rock-a-Bye Bounty
programme.desc: Dog and Beth must go after their former housekeeper, Lisa, who's jumped bond. They know this case will be tricky because Lisa knows everyone in the family. Luckily, Beth's nephew, Jason, is visiting and is quickly put to work as the bait.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Father-Hood
programme.desc: Before Tim heads out for a tough day of bounty hunting, he likes to get in a little quality time with his daughter, Summer Rain.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cops and Criminals
programme.desc: After giving a rousing speech to an audience of enthusiastic grade-schoolers, Dog catches up with an old friend, Sheriff Tommy Cayetano, to talk business. Dog's got a tough fugitive, named Mia, to catch and Tommy is happy to lend a hand.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cupid in Cuffs
programme.desc: It's the day before Valentine's Day and love is in the air at Da Kine Bail Bonds--but not for Tapi who has failed to appear in court on theft charges. Dog's plan is to have Leland knock on Tapi's door with a Valentine's gift to draw her out.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Alan in Charge
programme.desc: Jase and the guys convince Willie to hire his older brother Alan to work at Duck Commander, but when Alan begins micromanaging everyone, they quickly change their mind. Meanwhile, the ladies take a self-defense class and use John Luke as a punching bag.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Renaissance Men
programme.desc: When the Robertsons throw a Renaissance Fair birthday party for Godwin, various family members compete in a tournament to win knighthood.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Heroes Welcome
programme.desc: In this special episode, the Duck Commander team surprises two wounded veterans with a trip to Monroe so they can be in an episode of Duck Dynasty. To show their support, the Robertson family stages a color run to bring awareness to our wounded soldiers.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Pie Hard
programme.desc: Willie and Alan agree to help Miss Kay open her own bakery, but things take a turn when Kay is asked to hand over her secret recipes. Meanwhile, the guys in the duck call room take an extended lunch break by driving to Mississippi.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Van He'llsing
programme.desc: When Missy and Jase's son Reed purchases an old van to boost his music career, his parents begin to question some of his choices. Meanwhile, Willie helps Jep prepare River for a competitive wrestling league by introducing him to his friend.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Toad to Perdition
programme.desc: When Willie and his brothers spend too much time frog hunting, their wives challenge them to a "frogging" competition.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: RV There Yet?
programme.desc: The Robertson family takes a road trip to Liberty University where they will drop off John Luke and Mary Kate for their first year of college. Along the way, they stop in Nashville to visit Willie's friend Colt Ford.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Willie & Korie's Anniversorry
programme.desc: The Robertson family throws a party for Willie & Korie's 25th anniversary, but things take a dramatic turn when Willie and Korie reveal a big secret. Meanwhile, when Jase blames Uncle Si for getting him a parking ticket.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Statue of Imitations
programme.desc: When Willie asks a local chainsaw artist to make him a statue, he gets a big surprise when it's revealed that the statue is of an unlikely subject - Willie himself. Meanwhile, Jep and Jessica attempt to help Kay with her hoarding.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A Decent Proposal
programme.desc: On a trip to New York, Jase's son Reed proposes to his girlfriend, which inspires his father to fan the flames of romance back home with Missy. Meanwhile, Sadie asks Willie to be a guest lecturer at her business class.(n)

programme.title: Encounter
programme.desc: A group of friends uncover an otherworldly object in a rural field, which they soon discover holds greater secrets than they could imagine.(n)

programme.title: Queen of Outer Space
programme.desc: American astronauts are drawn by a mysterious force to the planet Venus, which they find to be inhabited only by beautiful women and their despotic queen.(n)

programme.title: Above the Shadows
programme.desc: Starring Olivia Thirlby, Alan Ritchson, Jim Gaffigan, Maria Dizzia, Tito Ortiz, David Johansen, and Megan Fox following an invisible woman who must find her way back with the help of the one man who can see her.(n)

programme.title: Robot Apocalypse
programme.desc: When expert hacker Tara tries to stop a powerful, sentient A.I. as it takes over the world's military, the A.I. marks her as a terrorist.(n)

programme.title: Foster
programme.desc: A heart-warming story of family and friendship starring Academy Award Nominee Toni Collette and Ioan Gruffudd.(n)

programme.title: Knucklehead
programme.desc: After incurring a large debt with a local criminal ringleader, Eddie Sullivan creates a get-rich-quick scheme and enlists a gentle giant named Walter as his unwitting accomplice.(n)

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: A teenager wanders into Carmel, California, where he is soon introduced to the art-forgery community.(n)

programme.title: Union Bound
programme.desc: Union Bound is a thrilling Civil War film that shows the strength and courage of the human spirit. Sergeant Joseph Hoover went to war to preserve the Union but finds himself captured and sent to a prisoner of war camp.(n)

programme.title: Rain
programme.desc: Set in 1968, a German Shepherd enrolled by his family in a training program that will send him to serve American soldiers in Vietnam. Even when Rain is wounded, he saves many, and bonds with a soldier who learns much from this very special dog.(n)

programme.title: Jack Hunter: And The Lost Treasure of Ugarit
programme.sub-title: And The Lost Treasure of Ugarit
programme.desc: Young archaeologist Jack Hunter refuses to join his mentor, Professor Shaffer, who believes a poem is a coded treasure map, on a relic hunt, until his friend is murdered to steal it. The suspect is a Syrian artifact trader so he flies to Damascas.(n)

programme.title: 2012: Ice Age
programme.desc: When a volcanic eruption in Iceland sends a glacier hurtling toward North America, a family struggles to escape the onslaught of the coming ice age.(n)

programme.title: Shoelaces For Christmas
programme.desc: When Jennifer’s father forces her to volunteer at the shelter to teach her compassion and responsibility, she creates an unlikely bond with the staff and a special young guest which makes her realize the true meaning of Christmas.(n)

programme.title: The Christmas Dragon
programme.desc: A group of orphans goes on a journey to restore the lost magic and save Christmas.(n)

programme.title: The Christmas Switch
programme.desc: Through Eddie's wit and guile, he gives Sam that last night and finally finds the real meaning of Christmas the gambler's way.(n)

programme.title: The Body
programme.desc: A crucified body dated back to the first century A.D is uncovered at an ancient cave in Jerusalem. Trouble ensues as word spreads.(n)

programme.title: Seduced By A Thief
programme.desc: When a security guard is blamed for the theft of a necklace, he tracks down the beautiful thief, only to be seduced into a world of diamond smuggling and double-cross.(n)

programme.title: Presumed Dead
programme.desc: An international crime novelist is the primary suspect in the disappearance of a young woman and it's up to Detective Mary Anne Cooper to piece together this bizarre missing person's case.(n)

programme.title: Warm Bodies
programme.desc: The unusual romance between a zombie (Nicholas Hoult) and a living woman (Teresa Palmer) sets in motion a series of events that may transform the entire lifeless world.(n)

programme.title: Boo! A Madea Halloween
programme.desc: Cranky, fast-talking Madea (Tyler Perry) finds herself under attack from ghosts, ghouls and zombies after breaking up a fraternity's Halloween party.(n)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Boo 2! A Madea Halloween
programme.desc: Madea, Aunt Bam and Hattie journey into the woods to prevent Tiffany from attending a Halloween frat party. Chaos soon strikes when the would-be heroes find themselves fighting for their lives against an array of monsters, goblins and boogeymen.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: Miracle at Boot Hill
programme.desc: A man who claims he can resurrect the dead poses a problem for killer Bill Groat.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: The Truth Teller
programme.desc: A reporter probes reports that a general is selling guns to Natives in exchange for their property.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: A Sponge Full of Vinegar
programme.desc: In Totem, Idaho, Dorsey Bilger has told one tall tale too many.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: Experiment in Fear
programme.desc: An unarmed Navajo sets out to avenge the murder and robbery of a Native elder.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: Miracle at Whiskey Gulch
programme.desc: Reverend Todd arrives in the wild frontier town of Whiskey Gulch with intentions of making it more civilized.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: Feud at Dome Rock
programme.desc: Fred and Jesse have filed claims to the same mine, and they're prepared to settle the matter with gunplay.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: Justice at Jackson Creek
programme.desc: A lawyer who has turned to the bottle is ostracized when he refuses to help a miner.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: Preacher with a Past
programme.desc: Former outlaw John Wesley Hardin's efforts to hide his past are threatened when an old friend comes to town.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: Abel Duncan's Dying Wish
programme.desc: Abel Duncan is dying and his last request is for both a priest and a rabbi to preside over his funeral.(n)

programme.title: Timber The Treasure Dog
programme.desc: A local villain is buying up all the ranches where 12-year-old Mickey and his family live, unless they can find a small fortune, they will lose theirs. Luckily, Mickeys dog Timber holds the clue to a legend of buried treasure.(n)

programme.title: Ice Girls
programme.desc: A 15-year-old figure skating champion leaves the sport after her mother loses her job and the family moves to a small town. She struggles to fit in until the owner of a local skating arena helps her fulfill her true potential.(n)

programme.title: An Elephant's Journey
programme.desc: Flora is a circus elephant who can no longer perform her tricks. The night before she's scheduled to be euthanized, the circus owner's 14-year old daughter, Dawn, sneaks Flora from the circus.(n)

programme.title: Accidentally Engaged
programme.desc: Famous actor Chas Hunter and aspiring actress Clarissa Byers agree to fake an engagement to improve both their reputations. However, playing pretend starts to feel all too real as the two start to fall for one another.(n)

programme.title: Bandidas
programme.desc: In turn-of-the-century Mexico, two very different women become a bank-robbing duo in an effort to combat a ruthless enforcer terrorizing their town.(n)

programme.title: The Decoy Bride
programme.desc: A heart-warming romantic comedy about an ordinary girl who is hired to be the decoy for the most famous bride in the world.(n)

programme.title: Unicorn City
programme.desc: To prove leadership skills to a potential employer, Voss, a hardcore gamer entices his gamer buddies to create a utopia, but paradise is disrupted when his former nemesis and guild master decides to wage war for the city and the heart of Voss’ true love.(n)

programme.title: The Uncanny
programme.desc: An author, convinced that cats are conspiring to replace the human race as masters of the earth, narrates three bizarre tales of feline terror.(n)

programme.title: Act of Murder
programme.desc: An actor attempts to win his former mistress back by putting stress on her husband by poisoning their family dog, and the farm animals at their country place, simulating a robbery attempt.(n)

programme.title: The Arsenal Stadium Mystery
programme.desc: A Scotland Yard inspector investigates the murder of amateur footballer during a charity soccer match against Arsenal at Highbury. Featuring Highbury itself with appearances from Arsenal manager George Allison and members of the team.(n)

programme.title: Checkpoint
programme.desc: The agent of an auto industrialist is sent to Italy to lure an Italian designer away from his firm. However, the plan goes wrong and leads to theft, corruption and even murder.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Antianeirai
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel travel to Istanbul to investigate the death of one Sydney's friends, a professor who was trying to prove Hercules did exist by finding the Belt of Hippolyte.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Faux Fox
programme.desc: When Nigel is charmed by brilliant student Lorraine to show her their offices (and kiss), a burglar knocks out Sidney, but what was robbed?(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Pandora's Box
programme.desc: Sidney inherits from the best relic hunter of the previous generation a key and rushes with Nigel on the hunt for the one treasure he never found: Pandora's box.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: The Warlord
programme.desc: Bekkastan, 1401 AD: warrior princess Kahina proves her right to rule. 2002: Sydney and Nigel unearth a cave painting that might lead them to Kahina's Saddle. But her descendants cause complications.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Fountain of Youth
programme.desc: While Nigel rehearses his keynote speech in a Seville hotel room, a girl nearly breaks his nose demanding something - it turns out she was after the water from the Fountain of Youth.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Arthur's Cross
programme.desc: Scotland Yard calls Sidney and Nigel to identify a 5th century murder weapon. It turns out to be the burial cross of King Arthur, but besides the victim several others are looking for it.(n)

programme.title: The Lost World: A Witch's Calling
programme.desc: While Roxton and Malone search for the missing Veronica, two young witches lure them away from safety. Unbeknownst to the explorers, a sorceress and her disciples plot to destroy Challenger.(n)

programme.title: The Lost World: Brothers in Arms
programme.desc: Malone is pierced by a poison dart from a Keeran blowdart. Under the influence of the hallucinogenic poison, Malone relives his nightmarish experience as a battlefield correspondent in WWI.(n)

programme.title: The Lost World: Ice Age
programme.desc: A new Ice Age threatens the ecosystem. The explorers investigate the site of a meteor crash and try to help a woman. Not knowing who she is, they are targeted by her cold-blooded subjects.(n)

programme.title: The Lost World: The End Game
programme.desc: The intractable Death comes to settle her score with Lord Roxton. In a series of games, Roxton plays Death in an attempt to keep his life, as well as the lives of his friends.(n)

programme.title: The Lost World: Phantoms
programme.desc: Veronica is led by the sound of piano music into the arms of a lover from a bygone era. Ignoring Challenger's warnings about her involvement with him, she falls quickly for her new beau.(n)

programme.title: The Lost World: The Secret
programme.desc: An assassin threatens the explorers, and Marguerite fears that he may be linked to her past and come to settle old scores. The secret she tries to bury creates a rift between herself and Roxton.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Wild West
programme.desc: Allen and Ton explain their strategies at a storage auction in San Bernardino, win two units, then have a Pepperbox gun and vintage Lionel train set appraised by experts.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Early Bird Special
programme.desc: Vintage Shooting Star carnival game; professional Mixed Martial Arts octagon fighting cage.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Smoking Ton
programme.desc: WW2 Stuart M3 tank barrel and heavy duty tank treads; rare, collectors' 1890 silver inlayed humidor; high-end industrial meat slicer in the ultimate restaurant unit.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: High Flying Ton
programme.desc: A nerdy auction buyer tests Ton and Allen's patience at a big container auction in Ventura. The guys discover a basket and burners for a hot air balloon and a 19th century German single shot rifle!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Home on the Gun Range
programme.desc: Barely making it to an auction in Corona, CA, Allen and Ton buy an overstuffed unit and find an antique crossbow, a rare 10-gauge Winchester shotgun and a 1940s Kiss-o-Meter.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Cold Hard Cash
programme.desc: Ton and Allen go North to Alaska and get a cold reception from the local auctioneer. They find two enormous seaplane pontoons and a pair of Smith & Wesson revolvers, including the most powerful production handgun in the world!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Money Makin' Monster Machines
programme.desc: The Auction Hunters team goes on the attack & ends up on a collision course with a hardened veteran auction buyer. They uncover a collection of speedy off-road vehicles and some hardcore heavy metal from the turn-of the-century!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Viva la Vegas
programme.desc: 1974 death-defying Zig Zag magic sword box, an ultra-rare 1910 poster of the infamous magician Chung Ling Soo, an 1800s naval cane sword and century-old Metlach German beer steins.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Gold 'n' Gloves
programme.desc: The Auction Hunters team goes toe-to-toe with Ton's evil twin! They find a medieval catapult designed for storming castles and Ton uncovers a hidden collection of gold bars worth thousands of dollars!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Rodeo Ton
programme.desc: 1970s El Toro mechanical bull used to train bull riders; silver WWII era banjo; a collection of 1800s handcrafted hunting duck decoys.(n)
